verses.verse: Hear,<WH8085> [O] sons,<WH1121> the instruction<WH4148> of a father, And give<WH1> attention<WH7181> that you may gain<WH7181> understanding,<WH3045>

Do not enter<WH935> the path<WH734> of the wicked,<WH7563> And do not proceed<WH833> in the way<WH1870> of evil<WH7451> men.<WH7451>
